00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 
00033 MTKt_status MtkDateTimeToJulian(
00034   const char *datetime, 
00035   double *jd  )
00036 {
00037   MTKt_status status; /* Return status */
00038   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00039   int year, month, day, hour, min, sec;
00040   int num_values;
00041 
00042   if (datetime == NULL || jd == NULL)
00043     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00044 
00045   num_values = sscanf(datetime,"%4d-%2d-%2dT%2d:%2d:%2d",&year,&month,
00046                       &day,&hour,&min,&sec);
00047 
00048   if (num_values != 6)
00049     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00050 
00051   status = MtkCalToJulian(year,month,day,hour,min,sec,jd);
00052   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00053 
00054   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00055 
00056 ERROR_HANDLE:
00057   return status_code;
00058 }
